metadata.title: how to check if a domain is available.
metadata.description: Powerful bulk domain search tool with AI-powered keyword generation to help you easily find and register ideal domains.
metadata.keywords: Bulk Domain Search, AI Domain Generator, Domain Keywords, Smart Domain Search, Domain Registration, Domain Tools

domain_age_checker.title: Domain Age Checker
domain_age_checker.description: Check domain registration date, age, and expiration time
domain_age_checker.input_description: Enter one full domain per line (e.g., example.com), supports up to 10 domains
domain_age_checker.about_description: Domain Age Checker helps you understand domain registration history and basic information. We use modern RDAP protocol to obtain accurate domain registration data.
features: Calculate accurate domain age (years, months, days)
Support bulk query of multiple domains
usage: Enter one complete domain per line (including TLD)
Only display information for registered domains
Data from official RDAP servers ensures accuracy
domain_age_checker.why_important_description: Domain age is an important indicator of website credibility and SEO value. Older domains usually have better search engine ranking potential and are more likely to gain trust from users and search engines. Understanding competitor domain registration times can help you develop better SEO strategies.
domain_age_checker.error_min_domains: Please enter at least one domain
